comments.body: the logical_xor and minmax signature should be removed in the below boolean loops section
Doesn't that apply to all the other defines as well? There's half a dozen which are being declared multiple times.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@#define BOOL_bitwise_and BOOL_logical_and
#define BOOL_bitwise_or BOOL_logical_or
#define BOOL_logical_xor BOOL_not_equal
#define BOOL_bitwise_xor BOOL_logical_xor
#define BOOL_multiply BOOL_logical_and
